name: Easydoesit Oatmeal Flatbread
author: HPetrus
summary: There was no bread in the building, and I needed to make some for the kids. This is reeeally simple, fast and tasty! You can make it from leftover oatmeal, mashed potatoes, or just about anything like that. Enjoy warm with butter.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Combine 1 cup water and 1/4 cup quick-cooking oats together in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave on full power until mixture is thick and creamy, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes
Mix oatmeal, flour, milk, vegetable oil, and salt together in a bowl
Spread evenly on a baking sheet; top with bits of butter
Bake in the preheated oven until brown on top, about 30 minutes
